TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs

summary.span: 为与鼠标相关且并不具体涉及鼠标按钮或鼠标滚轮的路由事件（如 ）提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件数据类用于下列附加事件。This event data class is used with the following attached events. - - - - - - 此事件数据类用于以下路由事件。This event data class is used with the following routed events. 这些路由的事件转发之前列出的附加的事件，以使它们更容易访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据，和的冒泡和隧道的路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 路由事件过程，这可能会影响该事件的处理的特征。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 除相关的所有路由事件，最感兴趣的属性的属性，可能会在使用实现是公开 （如的当前按钮状态的几个属性)和)。Other than the properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of that you might use in a implementation are several properties that expose the current button state (such as ) and ). 很有用，特别是因为你可以检查在其上。 is useful particularly because you can check on it. 请注意，专门处理鼠标按钮事件的事件使用不同的事件数据类， 。Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different event data class, . 鼠标按钮属性都位于以防输入的模式或涉及按钮，即使您正处理非按钮事件的交互。The mouse button properties are available on in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event. 类提供的其他属性和方法来确定鼠标的状态。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Point GetPosition (System.Windows.IInputElement relativeTo);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point GetPosition(class System.Windows.IInputElement relativeTo) cil managed
Public Function GetPosition (relativeTo As IInputElement) As Point
public: System::Windows::Point GetPosition(System::Windows::IInputElement ^ relativeTo);

param.name: relativeTo
param.span: 要用作用于计算鼠标指针位置的参考框架的元素。

span.span: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the mouse pointer.

summary.span: 返回相对于指定元素的鼠标指针位置。

span.span: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 相对于指定对象的鼠标指针位置的 x 和 y 坐标。

span.span: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 点 (0，0) 是参考框架的左上角。The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the frame of reference. 静态方法还可以用于获取的鼠标位置。The static method can also be used to obtain the position of the mouse.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub InvokeEventHandler (genericHandler As Delegate, genericTarget As Object)
protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用的一般处理程序。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 要对其调用处理程序的目标。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将强制转换为的泛型处理程序，然后调用它。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 有关此实现模式和它的原因的详细信息，请参阅和[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
